title: GPT-1
preview: OpenAI's first generative pre-trained transformer model, laying the foundation for large language models.

title: GPT-2
preview: GPT-2 demonstrated surprisingly coherent text generation, sparking debate over AI safety and open-sourcing.

title: GPT-3
preview: The 175B parameter model that revolutionized natural language interfaces and powered the first wave of AI API tools.

title: GPT-4
preview: A multimodal leap forward for OpenAI, capable of reasoning over images and text with more nuanced capabilities.

title: GPT-4 Turbo
preview: An optimized and cost-efficient variant of GPT-4 powering ChatGPT with custom GPTs, tools, and longer context.

title: Claude 1
preview: Anthropicâ€™s first Claude model, focused on safety through Constitutional AI, emphasizing harmlessness and transparency.

title: Claude 2
preview: An improved Claude model with stronger reasoning, fewer hallucinations, and increased openness for public use.

title: Claude 3 Family
preview: Anthropic launched Haiku, Sonnet, and Opus under the Claude 3 family, offering powerful capabilities across tasks.

title: Gemini 1
preview: The first Gemini model from Google DeepMind, merging strengths from AlphaCode, Pathways, and large-scale training.

title: Gemini 1.5
preview: Gemini 1.5 Pro featured industry-leading long-context capabilities, enabling advanced reasoning over vast documents.

title: The Illusion of Thinking
preview: A close look at apple's analysis of reasoning in LLMs through problem complexity reveals limitations in current benchmark design and model interpretability.
